channel.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
channel.description:
Hey guys, i've got a little question, i've got a server with only source, its based off.. some kinda delta/allstar ... :|
How do i add like ::givedonor and donator commands? i have tried command generator, but then i only get 100 errors ... :confused: The server got none member/donator things, but if any can help me, PLEASE! ;) :D :)
Thanks guys, ~ [size=24pt]Darkermans[/size] :D

item.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
item.dc:creator: @Darkermans Darkermans
item.description:
@Darkermans wrote:

ahh. messed up the whole server…
glad i took backup be4 i did, if u got time, u think u can teamview me?

Read full topic

item.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Darkermans, post:7, topic:369547”]ok thanks, but i get 8 errors when i compile.

[quote]Please Wait. The server is compiling.

                   (Errors\Help Box)

client.java:12075: name is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String)
String name = command.substring(4);
^
client.java:12079: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sM(java.lang.String)
location: class client
c.sM(“You have been promoted to Donator by " + p
layerName
^
client.java:12081: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable donator
location: class client
c.donator = 1;
^
client.java:12082: cannot find symbol
symbol : method savegame(boolean)
location: class client
savegame(true);
^
client.java:12083: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sM(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sM(“You’ve promoted " + command.substring(4) + "
to Donator.”);
^
client.java:12084: cannot find symbol
symbol : method yell(java.lang.String)
location: class client
yell(”" + playerName + " has promoted " + comman
d.substring(4)
^
client.java:12086: e is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String)
} catch (Exception e) {
^
client.java:12087: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sM(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sM(name + " either isn’t online or doesn’t exist
");
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
8 errors

The Server Was Compiled, (Compiler Made By: SkaterBoiX)

Any Suggestions Please contact my Moparscape Account
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote][/quote]
it means these are not coded in, like c.sM might be c.sendMessage for your server,
or just sendMessage, you just need to declare the correct symbols for it.

Read full topic

item.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Darkermans:

but what player right is donator?

player rights are not donator levels, you dont need to use player rights, the part that says donator

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && (donator >= 1)

is the level required of donator to use the command.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern

@drubrkletern wrote:

its ::add (playername)
no problem
you need at least 15 rep to rep someone back
and its just numbers ^^

item.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
item.dc:creator: @Darkermans Darkermans
item.description:
@Darkermans wrote:

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=465675.msg3405211#msg3405211 date=1290273404]
make donator command:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“add”)

Should i take like “adddonor or addmember?”
and btw, thank you man!
im new to this, how i rep?[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>

item.title: <317> How do i add ::givedonor and donator commands? Please help, tyvm:D <317>
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

make donator command:

if (command.startsWith("add") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Yournamehere")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been promoted to Donator by " + playerName + ". Log out to see changes."); c.donator = 1; savegame(true); sM("You've promoted " + command.substring(4) + " to Donator."); yell("" + playerName + " has promoted " + command.substring(4) + " to Donator."); } catch (Exception e) { sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
make sure thats how the character token looks like in your client.java/ player files.
as to make a donator command…
simple

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && (donator >= 1) && !isInPitGame()) { openUpBank();
see how instead of player rights, its donator? thats all you have to replace so its a donators command

Read full topic
